DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS SexFS v2.0 Brief Profile (Female) SFOGA201 Past 30 Days How Often Have Orgasm or Climax When Wanted Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response, in the past 30 days, of how often they have been able to have an orgasm/climax when they wanted to, using a 6-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female) Past 30 Days How Often Have Orgasm or Climax When Wanted Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how often an individual orgasmed or climaxed when they wanted to._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

Concepts.longName: PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)
Concepts.definition: A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days How Often Have Orgasm or Climax When Wanted Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:A question about how often an individual orgasmed or climaxed when they wanted to.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.longName: How Often Have Orgasm or Climax When Wanted
Concepts.definition: A question about how often an individual orgasmed or climaxed when they wanted to.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes ranging from 0 (Not attempted) to 5 (Always).

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: No Attempt to Orgasm or Climax

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No Attempt to Orgasm or Climax
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has not tried to have an orgasm or climax.

Concepts.longName: No Attempt to Orgasm or Climax
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has not tried to have an orgasm or climax.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: At all times; on every occasion.

Concepts.definition: At all times; on every occasion.
